name: Shopping Cart
desc: A Shopping Cart Project is a web application that allows users to browse products, add them to a cart, update quantities, and proceed to checkout. Built using React.js (frontend).

name: Recipe Finder App
desc: The Recipe Finder App helps users find recipes based on the ingredients they have. Users can enter ingredients, and the app will fetch matching recipes from an API

name: Fitness Tracker
desc: Fitness Tracker is a MERN app that helps users set fitness goals, log workouts, track nutrition, and monitor progress.
